name: MTD Digital
tagline: Information Technology and Services Agency Bury
description:
MTD Digital is the trading name of me, Jared Rigby. I have been working as a freelancer since August 2013 and have been privileged to work with a number of great clients on a huge variety of projects from e-commerce to interactive infographics. To see more of my previous work, please visit my portfolio. I can take your vision from concept to complete product whilst keeping you informed every step of the way.
I am passionate about the web and endeavour to keep developing my knowledge and skill set, keeping up-to-date with new technologies and best practises.
